game.name: Black Swan
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore the haunted history of a ballet school while guided by spirits from another dimension! Can you help guide these poor souls home? Find out, in Black Swan!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the haunted history of a ballet school while guided by spirits from another dimension! Can you help guide these poor souls home? Find out, in Black Swan!

reviewHighlights.text: Black Swan is a slow-burn, story-focused adventure that leans heavily on atmosphere, mystery, and traditional hidden-object mechanics to tell a tragic...
